text: Anthony Tiran Todd (December 4, 1954 – November 6, 2024) was an American actor. He was best known for playing Sergeant Warren in Platoon (1986), Kurn in Star Trek: The Next Generation (1990–1991) and Star Trek: Deep Space Nine (1996), the main character in four Candyman horror movies (1992–2021), and Willam Bludford in some Final Destination movies (2000–2025). Todd died from stomach cancer at his home in Marina del Rey, California on November 6, 2024, at the age of 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Interview by Kevin Nickelson for Blood Zone Media * New Interview With Tony at A3UPodcast.com * Interview with Tony Todd to discuss Hatchet 2 and future work * Tony Todd interview by DownRightCreepy.com to discuss Final Destination 5 and more! title: Tony Todd
